scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.update: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && git submodule update --remote
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:watch -w server" "npm run test:watch -w client"
